user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my undergarments, ensuring that I could wear them throughout the day without discomfort while also looking good.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive undergarment that I could wear all day without discomfort. The key attributes that attracted me were the soft stretch fabric, the seamless design, and the adjustable features that promised a customizable fit. The idea of a wireless bra that still provided lift and support was particularly appealing, as I wanted something that would enhance my shape naturally while being easy to wear under various outfits.

My main motivation for this purchase was the promise of comfort and support. The product description highlighted features like moisture-wicking fabric and targeted support, which were important to me. I was also influenced by the positive feedback from other customers, indicating that this bra was the most comfortable they had ever worn. The combination of practical features and strong customer reviews made it an easy choice for me.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, lightweight, and made from high-quality materials. I value items that offer a good fit and allow for ease of movement, particularly in clothing and footwear. Quick-drying fabrics and breathable materials are also important to me, as they enhance comfort during wear. Additionally, I appreciate products that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether for casual outings or active days. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are uncomfortable, poorly made, or do not meet my expectations in terms of quality. I have a strong aversion to products that feel cheap or do not provide adequate support, especially in footwear and undergarments.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Underwear Soft and Comfy Panties> / Item ID: B07RYZG4KJ / Price: $19.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Fruit of the Loom's young women's collection features three new silhouettes. A high leg bikini that sits just above the hip, A girl short that fits like your favorite hipster panty and a boy brief that gives a comfy boy short like fit. The modal fabric is super soft and smooth making it perfect to wear under anything. The ribbed fabric has the ultimate stretch combined with comfort. The wider waistbands on each of the styles is Non-Roll to fit and flatter. With assorted colors and prints there is a pair for every outfit or mood. Stock up on these favorites!"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."]
